text: aur unase sarataabee kee na unake lie aasamaan ke daravaaze khole jaengen aur vah behasht hee mein daakhil hone paegen yahaan tak ki oont sooee ke naake mein hokar nikal jae (yaani jis tarah ye muhaal hai) usee tarah unaka behasht mein daakhil hona muhaal hai aur ham mujarimon ko aisee hee saza diya karate hain unake lie jahannum (kee aag) ka bichhauna hoga
